job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: Company ProfileltbrgtltbrgtAt Morgan Stanley we advise originate trade manage and distribute capital for governments institutions and individuals and always do so with a standard of excellence We are a leading global financial services firm that conducts its business through three principal business segments Institutional Securities Wealth Management WM and Investment Management The Firms employees serve clients worldwide from more than 1200 offices in 43 countriesltbrgtltbrgtOur WM business is one of the largest in the world with more than 2 trillion in client assets 73 billion in lending balances and nearly 16000 Financial Advisors in 600 offices across the US Our Financial Advisors focus on delivering timely customized solutions and services that help clients meet their financial and life goals Our offering includes brokerage and investment advisory services financial and wealth planning access to credit and lending cash management annuities and insurance and retirement servicesltbrgtltbrgtAs a market leader the talent and passion of our people is critical to our success Together we share a common set of values rooted in integrity excellence and strong team ethic Morgan Stanley can provide a superior foundation for building a professional career  a place for people to learn to achieve and grow A philosophy that balances personal lifestyles perspectives and needs is an important part of our cultureltbrgtltbrgtDepartment ProfileltbrgtltbrgtGlobal Banking Technology GBT is a dynamic and fastpaced area within the Firms WM Technology Division We are responsible for creating innovative technology solutions for the Private Banking Group PBG one of the strategic growth areas of the Firm providing cash management and lending products and services to our WM clients This includes stateoftheart technology for a nationwide network of Private Bankers and product specialists who work with Financial Advisors to provide access to products and services such as online banking cards deposit products residential mortgages securitiesbased loans and tailored lending If you are an exceptional individual who is interested in solving complex problems and building sophisticated solutions in a dynamic team environment GBT is the place for youltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtJob SummaryltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtWe are looking for a DevOpsSite Reliability Engineer with a minimum of 5 years of industry experience preferably working in the financial IT community The position in the Global Banking Technology team is focused on delivering exceptional services to both BU and Dev partners to minimizeavoid any production outages The role will focus on production support within the Global Banking Technology automating deployments and working with the agile teams to build and support stable and reliable production systems The ideal candidate will be passionate about automation and skilled in one of the programming language PythonPERLSHELL Ruby JAVA C or the like Candidate should possess a strong understanding of database concepts job scheduler MQ Web services UNIXLINUXWindows OS as well as experience with debugging applications We are looking for a team player with excellent communications skills who is committed to continuously improving and delivering results Candidate should be organized disciplined detailoriented selfmotivated and deliveryfocusedltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtResponsibilitiesltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt Provide critical support for deposit applicationsltligtltligt Work closely with the application Development team to understand the platform and create toolsutilities to help with production managementltligtltligt Investigate and resolve enduser issues relating to the applicationsltligtltligt Taking proactive initiatives to Identify areas of improvement stabilize and improve the plantltligtltligt Scale systems sustainably through mechanisms like automation and evolve systems by pushing for changes that improve reliability and velocity includes automation for other various operational needsltligtltligt Troubleshooting infrastructure issues reviewing log files updating documentation and having knowledge base with resolutionsltligtltligt Working with upstream data providers and upstream consumers and reducing the amount of escalation to development teamsltligtltligt Taking ownership and managing production requests questions issuesltligtltligt Work closely with Application Development to ensure that the support team has excellent knowledge of the application set own and maintain support knowledgebase and documentsltligtltligt Develop scripts and assist with code changes along with operational tasksactivitiesltligtltligt Perform Root Cause Analysis for outagesincidentsltligtltligt Professional ownership of production problem related incidents and end user requestsltligtltligt Perform post incident analysisltligtltligt Understand the overall business flow of supported application systems and its interface with clientsltligtltligt Effectively provide updates on the issuesltligtltligt Incident management for application issuesltligtltligt Act as an escalation point to level 3 supportltligtltligt Be flexible to provide weekend on call rotation and available for offshore time leadltligtltligt Within the Application Support space to be accountable for the Production Environments as well as the nonProduction Environments for the existing GBT team and be part of 247 production support coverageltligtltligt Professional must have strong technical and troubleshooting skillltligtltligt Proactive ampamp reactive readyforbusiness checksltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtSkills Requiredltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt 5  8 years of experience in a production environment with a solid software development background and understanding of performance tuning endtoend troubleshooting networking fundamentals and appropriate attention to detailltligtltligt Strong problemsolving skillsltligtltligt Requires experience in designing developing and implementing technical solutions or significant experience in deep technical supportltligtltligt Must possess RDBMS skills in databases such as DB2 Sybase or Oracleltligtltligt Requires experience with Unix scripting Unix command lineltligtltligt Requires experience with Autosys or other batch scheduling softwareltligtltligt Knowledge and handson experience on Splunk and web service calls using Javaltligtltligt Handson Jenkins Train or Windeployltligtltligt Ability to diagnose technical problems debug optimize code and automate routine tasksltligtltligt Handson experience in application and database
